author: Paul Rae

review: I got one of these, played with it for a little bit, and honestly forgot about it.  Then my nephew came over and started playing NFL Highlight videos from the couch.  He didn't have to touch the TV remote.  I'm not sure how he even knew I had it.  After that, I was intrigued.  I ended up buying a second one for the bedroom.My TV menus can be a little slow to navigate, especially if you are trying to search for something.  With this, I can look up a video on my phone, which is MUCH easier and faster, and then just tap the Chromecast share button.  The TV automatically just starts playing the video.  You don't even have to change channels.If you stream a lot of video, this really is a must have.  Especially considering the price!
author: Ted D. Hadley

review: Best streaming media player out there! Very easy to set up and use. I didn't think that I would really have a use for this thing until I actually got it. Now that Google is expanding their support for it and allowing you to cast your screen (on select phones) I use it all the time! Might even buy 1 or 2 more the Christmas!
